121907.「あらあら いらっしゃあ～い♪\n ふたりとも おそろいで どうかしたの？:
Oh, my goodness, here you are! What's wrong
with the two of you, matching?

121908.「どうかしちゃったのは 君の方だよ……。\n 何か あったのかい？\n もしも:
You're the one who's lost your mind... is
something wrong? If you have a problem, you
can talk to me about it.

121909.「悩みなんて これっぽっちもないわ～。\n くよくよ悩んで うじうじ腐るなんて\:
I don't have any worries at all~. I don't want
to be bothered with worrying and fretting and
rotting. Happi~<heart>

121910.「まるで 母さんみたいなこと 言ってる……。\n <pc>。アルカナ・セラピアで:
You sound like my mother... <pc>. You
should get Juno a reading at the Arcana
Serapia...

121911.「<pc>が 私を占う？\n 私が アルカナ・セラピアされちゃうの？:
Will <pc> occupy me? I'm going to be
arcanaserapia?

121912.「うふふふふっ♪ 何それ おもしろ～い！\n さあっ。いつでも どーぞ！:
What's that, that's interesting~! Come on.
Anytime!

121913.<pc>は ユノへの 思いを込めて\nテーブルに セラピアカードを並べた。:
<pc> laid out the Serepia Cards on
the table with his thoughts for Juno.

121914.ユノは セラピアカードから\n「死神」のカードを引いた！: Juno drew Card "Reaper" from her Serepia Card!

121915.なんと ユノが引いたカードが\n不思議な声で <pc>に\n語りかけてくる……。:
Oh my, the card Juno drew speaks to
<pc> in a mysterious voice...

121916.<center>死神がささやく。終末を 受け入れよと。\n<%sEV_QUE_N:
The reaper whispers. Embrace the end.
Defeat <%dEV_QUE_T_NUM0> Skeletons.
Then the door to one's heart shall open.

121917.「ししししっ 死神って！？\n な…なんだか イヤな感じのカードだね……。\n: Reaper? What kind of trial did they give you?

121918.「<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>を <%nEV_QUE_T_NUM0>匹 倒す:
Defeat <%dEV_QUE_T_NUM0> Skeletons... I think you can find
them deep in the Rhonda Ice Cave or in
Landonfoot.

121920.「……こんなユノは ユノじゃないよ。\n きっと 何か 原因があるはずなんだ。:
...Juno like this is not Juno. There must be
some cause.

121921.「君の占いだけが 頼りだよ……。\n ユノのために どうか よろしくお願いします:
Your fortune-telling is the only thing I can
rely on... For Juno's sake, please take care
of her. Please be careful...!

121922.「ようこそ 才能ある新人さん。\n 大歓迎しちゃう……♪:
Welcome, talented newcomers. We'd love to
welcome you... ♪

121923.「うふふ……。ここは ユノの心の中のはずなのに\n どうして アタシが いるのか:
Ummm... why am I here when I'm supposed to be
in Juno's mind? Okay, I'll tell you why. I'll
make an exception...

121924.「これこそは すべての始まり……。\n 人々が 新たなる次元へ 旅立つための\n:
This is the beginning of everything... the
first big, big step in people's journey into a
new dimension.

121925.「この子の心は アタシと ひとつに溶け合った。\n 邪魔はさせない！ 誰にも 渡:
Her heart melded with mine. I will not be
disturbed! No one can have it!

121927.「あら……また来たの。\n さすがは 才能ある新人さん。\n チャレンジ精神たっ:
Oh...here you are again. You are indeed a
talented newcomer. You have a challenging
spirit.

121928.「どうか あなたにも わかってほしい。\n 幕は切って 落とされた。\n この子:
Please, I hope you understand. The curtain has
been cut. No one can take her heart away from
me...!

121930.「やっぱり あなた いいわ……！\n ユノが 見込んだだけのことは あるわね。:
You're good. You're just as good as Juno
thought you were.

121931.「こんなにも 優秀な弟子にめぐまれて 幸せよ。\n おかげさまで 最高のスタート:
I'm so happy to have such a talented
apprentice. Thanks to you, I'm off to a great
start<heart>

121932.「ついに アタシたち占い師が すべての人々を\n 深き闇の淵から 救う時が来たの:
At last, the time has come for fortune tellers
to save all people from the depths of
darkness. A dream come true...

121934.「……流しの占い師だそうだよ。: ...I heard he's a fortune teller in the sink.

121935.「まだ ずいぶん若いじゃないか。\n 母ひとり 子ひとりで？:
You are still very young. Mother alone, child
alone?

121936.「子供を連れて 旅をするのは\n 大変だろうに……。:
I know how hard it must be to travel with a
child in tow...

121937.「手の施しようもない ひどい熱なんだよ。\n あれじゃ きっと近いうち……。:
It's a terrible fever. There's nothing we can
do. I'm sure one of these days...

121938.「母親は 占い師なんだろ？\n 病気になることくらい\n あらかじめ わからない:
Your mother is a fortune teller, right? Can't
you at least tell in advance that she's going
to get sick?

121939.「さあね？ 占い師も ピンからキリまで\n ってことじゃないのかい……。:
I don't know. Fortune tellers come in all
shapes and sizes, don't they?

121940.「……母さんは 世界一の占い師よ。:
My mother is the best fortune teller in the
world.

121941.「何度……何度占っても\n あなたのそばに 死神がたたずみ\n あなたの命を 奪:
No matter how many times you read your
fortune... the reaper will stand by your side
and try to take your life...

121942.「お医者様にも診せた。高価な薬も使った。\n あなたの病を 治すためなら なんで:
I saw a doctor. I used expensive medicines. I
did everything I could to cure your illness. I
tried everything to change your fate.

121943.「なのに 死神は 決して消えない……！\n 占うたびに 絶望的な未来を突きつけら:
And yet, the reaper never goes away...! Every
time I divine, I am confronted with a hopeless
future. I am...I am...!

121944.「いいの……。もう いいのよ。\n 私は 自分の運命を 受け入れるわ……。: It's okay... it's okay. I accept my fate.

121946.「占い師なんて 無力だわ！\n こんなにも幼い子を いとしい子を……\n 自分の:
Fortune tellers are powerless! Unable to save
a child so young, a child so dear to me, my
own daughter!

121947.「……そんなことないわ。\n 占い師は すばらしい職業よ。:
No, it's not true. Being a fortune teller is a
wonderful profession.

121948.「すべての人々を 心の闇から……\n 悩み苦しみから 救ってあげられる。\n こ:
I can save all people from the Dark Mind, from
their worries and suffering. There is no other
profession like it.

121949.「すべての人々を 心の闇から 救う……？: To save all people from the Dark Mind...?

121950.「……母さんみたいな 占い師になりたかった。\n 占い師になって 世界中のみんな:
I wanted to be a fortune teller like you. I wanted to become a fortune teller and eliminate the worries and pain that everyone
in the world had...

121952.「あなたの夢は アタシが かなえてあげるわ。: I will make your dreams come true.

121954.「ええ……。心配かけて ごめんなさい。: Yeah... I'm sorry for worrying you.

121955.「いったい 何が あったのか\n 話を 聞かせてくれるかい……？:
Would you like to tell us what the hell
happened?

121956.「私は 小さな頃から 母さんのそばで\n 深い心の闇を抱え 悩み 苦しむ相談者を:
Ever since I was a small child, I have seen
many counselors suffering from the deep Dark
Mind at my mother's side...

121957.「私も 占いを覚えて 悩める人々を救いたい。\n 母さんに そう打ち明けたら と:
I want to learn divination and help those who
are suffering. When I told my mother this, she
was very happy to teach me the Arcana Serapia.

121958.「アルカナ・セラピアを使って ピュアパールを\n 集め続ければ いつか 世の人々:
If you continue to collect pure pearls using
Arcana Serapia, one day all the troubles and
sufferings of the world will disappear...

121959.「前から 気になってたんだけど……\n ピュアパールって どうやって使うの？\n:
I've always wondered... how does Pure Pearl
work? I always used to give them to my mom.

121960.「それが……ピュアパールの 実際の使い方は\n 私も くわしく 聞いてないんです:
I haven't heard much about how Pure Pearl is
actually used. But...

121961.「……この間の 休みの日のことです。\n <pc>さんたちが 酒場に出かけた後\:
...the other day during the vacations. After
<pc> and the others had gone out to
the tavern, my mother came to visit me.

121962.「そして こう告げたのです。\n これは 人々を悩みから救うための 第一歩よ。\:
And then he said, "This is the first step
toward saving people from their problems.
You...will be their guide."

121963.「母さんが 私の胸に ピュアパールを\n 押し当てると パールは そのまま\n:
She pressed a pure pearl against my chest, and
the pearl just slipped right into my body...

121964.「その先の記憶は とても あやふやで……。: Beyond that, my memories are very hazy.

121965.「うん……あの日から ユノはおかしかった。\n まるで 人が 変わったみたいだっ:
Yeah...Juno was strange from that day on. It
was as if he had changed.

121966.「それに いしずえって……どういう意味？\n 母さんは 何を考えてるんだろう……:
And what do you mean by "I want to be with
you"? I wonder what Mom was thinking...

121967.「ピュアパールは 人々を救うためのものだと\n 信じてました。でも……違うかもし:
I believed Pure Pearl was meant to save
people. But... maybe not. I want to question
my mother about the truth.

121968.「そこに 危険な企みが あるのだとしたら\n 私は 占い師として 弟子として 子:
If there is a dangerous plot in there, then I,
as a fortune teller, as a disciple, as a
child... must stop you. I must stop her!

121969.「<pc>さん……これから先も きっと\n あなたの助けが 必要になるでしょう。:
<pc>...We will surely need your help
in the future. Please lend us your help.

121970.「そのために 私はこれから あなたに\n 占い師の必殺技を 教えます。:
To that end, I am going to teach you a special
trick of fortune tellers.

121971.「この技があれば いざという時の\n 戦いにも 役立つでしょう。\n さあ タロ:
This skill will serve you well in a fight when
the time comes. Now, pull out your tarot
cards...

121972.「これは ほんの少しですが 私の気持ちです。\n あなたの助けになるよう 用意し:
These are just a few of my feelings. I have
prepared it to help you. Please receive it.

121973.「まずは 本物の母さんが どこへ行ったのか\n 居場所を 突き止めましょう。:
First, we need to locate where the real mom
went.

121974.「そうだね……みんなで 手分けして探そう。\n チキ坊。お前も ちゃんと手伝うん:
Well... let's all split up and look for it
together. Chickibo. You're supposed to help
out, too, right?

121975.「……なんだか 不吉な予感がします。\n あなたは 修業に 充分 はげんでから\:
I have an ominous feeling. After you have had
enough of your training, please call on me in
your fortune teller state.

142649.「それじゃ 引くわよー<heart>\n 何が出るかな？ 何が出るかな～？:
I'll pull then <heart> What do you think I'll get?
What do you think will come out?
